entry.title: DRM Annual Meeting
entry.content: The DRM Lab’s annual wrap-up meeting for 2023 was held on 5 January 2024 in 1619 Information Building. It focused on reviewing the excellent achievements of the lab in all directions in the past year and recognised a series of advanced individuals and organisations.
entry.summary: The DRM Lab’s annual wrap-up meeting for 2023 was held on 5 January 2024 in 1619 Information Building. It focused on reviewing the excellent achievements of the lab in all directions in the past year and recognised a series of advanced individuals and organisations.
